mapper.update: update business_target_task_monitor set up_item_count = #{upItemCount},status = #{status} where target_id = #{targetId} and department_id = #{officeCode} and plan_id = #{businessCheckPlanId}
update business_target_task_monitor set status = #{status} where target_id = #{targetId} and user_id = #{userCode}
mapper.select: SELECT m.*,t.id as targetId,t.target_content as targetContent FROM business_target_task_monitor m LEFT JOIN business_target t ON m.target_id = t.id
select target_id,data_item_count,up_item_count from business_target_task_monitor where target_id = #{targetId} and department_id = #{officeCode} and plan_id = #{businessCheckPlanId}
select COUNT(department_id) from business_target_task_monitor where status = #{status}
